DOC.detailed_description: This single- multiple-dose , randomize , open-label study conduct healthy Chinese subject . In single-dose study , volunteer randomly assign 4 dose group receive single dose 200 , 400 , 800 , 1200 mg rufinamide tablet fast condition . An additional food effect study perform 200-mg dose group assess change PK parameter high-fat diet . In multiple-dose study , 10 subject administer 200-mg rufinamide formulation twice daily 6 consecutive day . LC-MS/MS method apply determine plasma concentration rufinamide . Tolerability assess base investigator inquiry , spontaneous report , clinical evaluation standard laboratory test , vital sign , physical examination 12-lead electrocardiography .
